column5: Located in Ekangapura reserved area, It is like a mud pit. A wall has been built using earth and stones. About 30 families use water in this spring. column5: There are 4 tanks that were built about 50 years ago and are currently I dilapidated condition. Currently, about 300 families use water irregularly using pipes. There are tea plantations around the area where the spring is located. Trees can be planted around the spring in an area of about 4 perches.
